Text:
Doesnt work with WMP, file is corrupt. It`ll work on vlc

sound 4/10
video 4/10

If your a real fan, wait for a much better copy it`ll be well worth the wait. or better still...go to the cinema and see it properly in 3D
Watchable, but barely. Filmed in a 3D theatre so picture very fuzzy and part of the right side of the screen is missing. Aspect ratio is 2:1 should be 2.35:1.
